attributes.action: Pass a law Making sure Private landlords Rent up to date house
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A law to be passed to make sure each private rented house be updated to modern standard's. Central heating system's must be in place before the house's are alowed to be rented out and the General condition of the house must be maintained at proper standard's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
